import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' export default class Login extends React.Component { state = { name: "", email: "", password: "", newUser: false } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) console.log(this.state.newUser) } returnLogin = (event) => { this.props.loginUser(this.state) } render() { return(

User Login

Check box if you wish to create a new user account Full Name: Email: Email address is used for login Password: Password is encripted using Bcrypt GEM
) } }
